Improve your Profiling Session

Define profiling rules as restrictive as possible as this can improve the accuracy of your measurements and impose less overhead. As a simple rule of thumb, leave only those ACCEPT rules that refer to your application classes and, at the end of the list, put a REJECT on *(*).

Remember that you can always change your mind and write new rules that can be activated without restarting your application.

Profiler4j in Application Servers

Profiler4j can be used to profile applications running in JBoss and Tomcat. See our FAQs for details.
